title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 28 - Implementation Of Banking Law, Section 103
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 28 - Implementation Of Banking Law, Section 103

State Regulations
§ 28.1 - Designation of departments, agencies and instrumentalities of the united states and the state of new york
§ 28.2 - Designation of public benefit corporations
§ 28.3 - Designation of rated investment securities
§ 28.4 - Designation of international lending facilities
§ 28.5 - The new york city community preservation corporation
§ 28.6 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 28

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 103[1][a], [c], [i], [4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
